PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09072019-06-22ESDC,  LAB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Occupational Health and Safety Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS (COHSR) in order to (1) mitigate the risk of injury by updating the references to the standards that are incorporated by reference in PART XII in order to demand compliance with the latest standards that reflect current technical requirements and safety practices required in the work place; (2) modernize the section on fall-protection systems in order to properly reflect industry standards and practices and to reference newly developed standards; (3) eliminate gaps that have caused a reduction in the health and safety protection of employees by bringing the technical requirements up to industry best practices and harmonizing them with other parts of the COHSR, the Code and with other Canadian jurisdictions; and (4) reduce the risk of misinterpretation by clarifying the language in certain sections of Part XII.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0243 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
